actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a job placement index in the Civil Service Commission.

summary.text: Directs the Civil Service Commission to establish, maintain, and keep current, on a monthly basis insofar as possible, a job placement index of all vacant positions in the competitive service in the executive branch of the Government, and to organize such index into such categories as the Commission considers to be appropriate.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a job placement index in the Civil Service Commission.
